templates.title: Airsonic
templates.name: airsonic
templates.description: Airsonic is a free, web-based media streamer, providing ubiquitous access to your music. Use it to share your music with friends, or to listen to your own music while at work. You can stream to multiple players simultaneously, for instance to one player in your kitchen and another in your living room.
templates.note: Access the web UI at http://<your-ip>:4040. Configure music and playlist paths as needed.

templates.title: Authelia
templates.name: authelia
templates.description: An open-source authentication and authorization server providing 2-factor authentication and single sign-on (SSO) for your applications via a web portal.
templates.note: Requires a configuration.yml file in /portainer/Files/AppData/Authelia. See documentation: https://docs.authelia.com/deployment/deployment-ha

templates.title: Bazarr
templates.name: bazarr
templates.description: Bazarr is a companion application to Sonarr and Radarr. It can manage and download subtitles based on your requirements.
templates.note: Access Bazarr at http://<your-ip>:6767. Configure with Sonarr/Radarr for subtitle management.

templates.title: Beets
templates.name: beets
templates.description: Beets catalogs your music collection, automatically improving its metadata using the MusicBrainz database.
templates.note: Access Beets at http://<your-ip>:8337. Configure music paths and metadata settings.

templates.title: Booksonic
templates.name: booksonic
templates.description: Booksonic is a server and app for streaming audiobooks to any PC or Android phone.
templates.note: Access Booksonic at http://<your-ip>:4041 to stream audiobooks.

templates.title: EmbyStat
templates.name: embystat
templates.description: EmbyStat is a web server that calculates statistics from your local Emby server.
templates.note: Access the UI at http://<your-ip>:6555. Follow the setup wizard to configure.

templates.title: Headphones
templates.name: headphones
templates.description: Headphones is an automated music downloader for NZB and torrents, integrating with SABnzbd and other downloaders.
templates.note: Access Headphones at http://<your-ip>:8181 to manage music downloads.

templates.title: Heimdall
templates.name: heimdall
templates.description: Heimdall organizes links to your most used websites and web applications in a simple dashboard.
templates.note: Access Heimdall at http://<your-ip>:8082 or https://<your-ip>:8443.

templates.title: Homer
templates.name: homer
templates.description: Homer is a simple static homepage for your server, configured via a YAML file.
templates.note: Requires a config.yml file in /portainer/Files/AppData/Homer. See documentation: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer
Access Homer at http://<your-ip>:8902 after configuring the YAML file.

templates.title: Huginn
templates.name: huginn
templates.description: Huginn creates agents that monitor and act on your behalf, automating tasks and notifications.
templates.note: Access Huginn at http://<your-ip>:3000 to set up agents.

templates.title: Invoice Ninja
templates.name: invoice_ninja
templates.description: Invoice Ninja is a Laravel-based platform for invoices, expenses, and tasks.
templates.note: Requires a database setup (user: invoice_ninja, database: ninja_db). Generate an APP_KEY as per documentation: https://github.com/invoiceninja/dockerfiles

templates.title: Jackett
templates.name: jackett
templates.description: Jackett acts as a proxy server, translating queries from apps like Sonarr into tracker-specific HTTP queries.
templates.note: Access Jackett at http://<your-ip>:9117 to configure trackers.

templates.title: Jellyfin
templates.name: jellyfin
templates.description: Jellyfin is a free media system for managing and streaming your media, an alternative to Emby and Plex.
templates.note: Access Jellyfin at http://<your-ip>:8096 to manage your media.

templates.title: Kodi Headless
templates.name: kodi-headless
templates.description: Headless Kodi installation for library updates.
templates.note: Configure Kodi library updates via the headless instance.

templates.title: LazyLibrarian
templates.name: lazylibrarian
templates.description: LazyLibrarian follows authors and grabs metadata for your digital reading needs.
templates.note: Access LazyLibrarian at http://<your-ip>:5299 to manage ebooks.

templates.title: Let's Encrypt
templates.name: letsencrypt
templates.description: Sets up an Nginx web server with a built-in Let's Encrypt client for free SSL certificates.
templates.note: Ensure port 443 is forwarded to this container. Configure domain and email for SSL.

templates.title: LibreSpeed
templates.name: librespeed
templates.description: A free and open-source HTML5 speed test tool.
templates.note: Access LibreSpeed at http://<your-ip>:8085 to test network speed.

templates.title: Lychee
templates.name: lychee
templates.description: Lychee is a free photo-management tool for uploading, managing, and sharing photos.
templates.note: Access Lychee at http://<your-ip>:8086 to manage photos.

templates.title: MariaDB
templates.name: mariadb
templates.description: MariaDB is an enhanced, drop-in replacement for MySQL.
templates.note: Access MariaDB via a database client on port 3306. Set a secure root password.

templates.title: McMyAdmin 2
templates.name: mcmyadmin2
templates.description: McMyAdmin 2 is a web control panel and administration console for Minecraft servers.
templates.note: Access McMyAdmin at http://<your-ip>:8087. Minecraft server runs on port 25565.

templates.title: Medusa
templates.name: medusa
templates.description: Medusa is an automatic video library manager for TV shows, downloading new episodes as they become available.
templates.note: Access Medusa at http://<your-ip>:8088 to manage TV shows.

templates.title: Minetest
templates.name: minetest
templates.description: Minetest is an open-source alternative to Minecraft, running a multiplayer server.
templates.note: Connect to the Minetest server on port 30000 (UDP).

templates.title: Minisatip
templates.name: minisatip
templates.description: Minisatip is a multi-threaded SAT>IP server for streaming DVB-S/S2/T/T2/C/C2 and ATSC signals.
templates.note: Configure Minisatip for DVB streaming on ports 8875 and 554.

templates.title: Mstream
templates.name: mstream
templates.description: Mstream is a personal music streaming server for streaming music to any device.
templates.note: Access Mstream at http://<your-ip>:3001 to stream music.

templates.title: Murmur
templates.name: murmur
templates.description: Murmur is the server backend for Mumble, a voice chat program for gamers.
templates.note: Connect to the Mumble server on port 64738.

templates.title: MusicBrainz
templates.name: musicbrainz
templates.description: MusicBrainz is an open music encyclopedia that collects and shares music metadata.
templates.note: Access MusicBrainz at http://<your-ip>:5000 to explore music metadata.

templates.title: Muximux
templates.name: muximux
templates.description: Muximux is a lightweight portal to manage HTPC apps without multiple browser tabs.
templates.note: Access Muximux at http://<your-ip>:8089 to manage your apps.

templates.title: Mylar
templates.name: mylar
templates.description: Mylar is an automated comic book downloader for CBR/CBZ files.
templates.note: Access Mylar at http://<your-ip>:8090 to manage comics.

templates.title: Nextcloud
templates.name: nextcloud
templates.description: Nextcloud is a self-hosted file sync and collaboration platform.
templates.note: Requires a database setup (user: nextcloud, database: nextcloud_db). Check the database host in Portainer.

templates.title: Nginx
templates.name: nginx
templates.description: Nginx is a high-performance web server and reverse proxy with low memory usage.
templates.note: Access Nginx at http://<your-ip>:8090 or configure as a reverse proxy.

templates.title: Nginx Proxy Manager
templates.name: nginx-proxy-manager
templates.description: Nginx Proxy Manager simplifies forwarding to websites with free SSL support.
templates.note: Access the admin panel at http://<your-ip>:8092 to configure proxies.

templates.title: NZBGet
templates.name: nzbget
templates.description: NZBGet is a high-performance Usenet downloader with low resource usage.
templates.note: Access NZBGet at http://<your-ip>:6789 to manage Usenet downloads.

templates.title: NZBHydra 2
templates.name: nzbhydra2
templates.description: NZBHydra 2 is a meta-search for NZB indexers, integrating with downloaders.
templates.note: Access NZBHydra 2 at http://<your-ip>:5076 to configure indexers.

templates.title: Ombi
templates.name: ombi
templates.description: Ombi is a request and user management system for Plex.
templates.note: Access Ombi at http://<your-ip>:3579 to manage Plex requests.

templates.title: OpenVPN Access Server
templates.name: openvpn-as
templates.description: OpenVPN Access Server provides secure VPN tunneling with management capabilities.
templates.note: Access the admin panel at https://<your-ip>:9443.

templates.title: Organizr v2
templates.name: organizr-v2
templates.description: Organizr provides a unified webpage for accessing your server applications.
templates.note: Access Organizr at http://<your-ip>:8093 to organize your apps.

templates.title: OScam
templates.name: oscam
templates.description: OScam is an open-source softcam for decrypting digital TV channels.
templates.note: Configure OScam for TV decryption on ports 8888 and 10000.

templates.title: PhotoShow
templates.name: photoshow
templates.description: PhotoShow turns a photo album into a web gallery.
templates.note: Access PhotoShow at http://<your-ip>:8094 to view your photos.

templates.title: Snibox
templates.name: snibox
templates.description: Snibox is a self-hosted snippet manager with a label-oriented interface.
templates.note: Access Snibox at http://<your-ip>:3010 to manage code snippets.

templates.title: Bookstack
templates.name: bookstack
templates.description: Bookstack is a free and open-source wiki for creating documentation with a WYSIWYG editor.
templates.note: Default login: admin@admin.com, password: password. Database: bookstackapp, user: bookstack.

templates.title: Chevereto
templates.name: chevereto
templates.description: Chevereto is a fast image hosting script for creating your own image hosting website.
templates.note: Access Chevereto at http://<your-ip>:8095. Configure database settings.

templates.title: Chowdown
templates.name: chowdown
templates.description: Chowdown saves recipes in plain text and creates beautiful recipe pages.
templates.note: Access Chowdown at http://<your-ip>:4000 to manage recipes.

templates.title: Calibre Web
templates.name: calibre-web
templates.description: Calibre Web provides a clean interface for browsing, reading, and downloading eBooks.
templates.note: Access Calibre Web at http://<your-ip>:8096 to manage eBooks.

templates.title: ProtonMail Bridge
templates.name: protonmail-bridge
templates.description: ProtonMail Bridge enables ProtonMail email integration with desktop email clients.
templates.note: See setup documentation: https://hub.docker.com/r/shenxn/protonmail-bridge/
Configure ProtonMail Bridge for email client integration.

templates.title: Pritunl
templates.name: pritunl
templates.description: Pritunl is an open-source VPN server with IPv6 and reverse proxy support.
templates.note: Requires an external MongoDB. See documentation: https://hub.docker.com/r/goofball222/pritunl

templates.title: Pydio
templates.name: pydio
templates.description: Pydio is an open-source file sharing and synchronization platform.
templates.note: Access Pydio at https://<your-ip>:8447 to manage files.

templates.title: qBittorrent
templates.name: qbittorrent
templates.description: qBittorrent is an open-source BitTorrent client with a web interface.
templates.note: Access qBittorrent at http://<your-ip>:8097 to manage torrents.

templates.title: Quassel IRC
templates.name: quassel-core
templates.description: Quassel IRC is a distributed IRC client with a central core and optional web UI.
templates.note: Connect to Quassel IRC on port 4242.

templates.title: Radarr
templates.name: radarr
templates.description: Radarr is a movie collection manager that integrates with downloaders.
templates.note: Access Radarr at http://<your-ip>:7878 to manage movies.

templates.title: Reactive-Resume
templates.name: reactive-resume
templates.description: Reactive-Resume is a secure, customizable resume builder.
templates.note: Access Reactive-Resume at http://<your-ip>:8098 to create resumes.

templates.title: Resilio Sync
templates.name: resilio-sync
templates.description: Resilio Sync uses BitTorrent to sync files across devices.
templates.note: Access Resilio Sync at http://<your-ip>:8888 to sync files.

templates.title: ruTorrent
templates.name: rutorrent
templates.description: ruTorrent is a web-based torrent client for managing downloads.
templates.note: Access ruTorrent at http://<your-ip>:8099 to manage torrents.

templates.title: SABnzbd
templates.name: sabnzbd
templates.description: SABnzbd is a Usenet downloader that automates downloading, verifying, and extracting files.
templates.note: Access SABnzbd at http://<your-ip>:8080 to manage Usenet downloads.

templates.title: Shiori
templates.name: shiori
templates.description: Shiori is a simple bookmarks manager written in Go, with web and CLI interfaces.
templates.note: Access Shiori at http://<your-ip>:8081 to manage bookmarks.
